value.title: Kerala HC to implement machine learning system to verify bail applications
value.excerpt: Kochi: For the first time in India, Kerala HC is all set to implement a machine learning system for checking bail pleas. From July 10, bail applications will be verified via a special software and will be accepted only in the prescribed format.

value.title: Simple data gets the most out of quantum machine learning
value.excerpt: New theoretical research proves that machine learning on quantum computers requires far simpler data than previously believed. The finding paves a path to maximizing the usability of today's noisy, intermediate-scale quantum computers for simulating quantum systems and other tasks better than classical digital computers,
